Package hrps.control

Class GuestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • hrps.control.GuestController
  • public class GuestController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a container for all guests and all methods for guest-related operations, including creating, searching, and updating guests' information.
    Author:
    Peng Wenxuan, An Ruyi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.lang.String GUEST_DATA_DIR
      Guests data file's path.
      private static GuestController guestController
      The static controller instance to avoid multiple instantiations.
      private java.util.List<Guest> guestList
      List of registered guests.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private GuestController()
      Initialize GuestController by reading from guests data file, if the data file does not exist at the given path, create it and write the on-memory guests data to the newly created file.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static GuestController getInstance()
        Get the GuestController instance that can be used to call non-static GuestController methods.
        Returns:
        A singleton GuestController instance.

      • searchGuestByName

        public java.util.List<Guest> searchGuestByName​(java.lang.String guestName)
        Searching for guests with name exactly same as the input string, case ignored.
        Parameters:
        guestName - Name string to be searched
        Returns:
        A list of guests with the specified name.

      • searchGuestByRelativeName

        public java.util.List<Guest> searchGuestByRelativeName​(java.lang.String keyword)
        Searching for guests whose name's words array contains the specified string, case ignored. eg: guestnames = ["John A", "John B"] keyword = "John": John A, John B are found keyword = "A": John A is found keyword = "john": John A, John B are found keyword = "jo": no one is found
        Parameters:
        keyword - The specified String.
        Returns:
        A list of guests whose name contains the specified string.

      • searchGuestByContact

        public java.util.List<Guest> searchGuestByContact​(java.lang.String guestContact)
        Searching for guests with a specific contact information, case ignored.
        Parameters:
        guestContact - Contact information string to be searched
        Returns:
        A list of guest with the specified contact information.

      • createGuest

        public Guest createGuest​(java.lang.String guestName,
                         java.lang.String creditCardNo,
                         java.lang.String creditBillingAddress,
                         java.lang.String address,
                         java.lang.String country,
                         java.lang.String gender,
                         java.lang.String IDNumber,
                         IDType IDType,
                         java.lang.String nationality,
                         java.lang.String contact)
        Create a new guest and add that guest to the guest container and update the data file.
        Parameters:
        guestName - Name of guest
        creditCardNo - Credit card number in type of string, should only contain digits from 0 to 9
        creditBillingAddress - Credit card billing address, different parts should be separated by commas
        address - Guest's address, different parts should be separated by commas
        country - Guest's country
        gender - Guest's gender
        IDNumber - Guest's id number
        IDType - Guest's id type, an enum constant of IDType (see enum IDType for more information)
        nationality - Guest's nationality
        contact - Guest's contact information
        Returns:
        The guest just created

      • updateGuestName

        public void updateGuestName​(Guest guest,
                            java.lang.String guestName)
        Update a guest's name.
        Parameters:
        guest - Guest to be updated
        guestName - New name

        Update a guest's credit card information.
        Parameters:
        guest - Guest to be updated
        updatedCreditCardNum - New credit card number
        updatedBillingAddress - New billing address

      • checkCreditCardInput

        public boolean checkCreditCardInput​(java.lang.String creditCardNo)
        Check if a credit card number is in valid standard. Here, we assume that any credit card number with 16 digits are valid credit card.
        Parameters:
        creditCardNo - The credit card number to be checked
        Returns:
        true if credit card number is in valid standard, false otherwise

      • checkContactInput

        public static boolean checkContactInput​(java.lang.String contact)
        Check if a String is a valid contact number, which is defined as a numeral string with up to 15 digits.
        Parameters:
        contact - The String to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the specified String is a valid contact number, false if it is not.
